== Description ==

Displays the date of the post in <tt>YYYY-MM-DD</tt> format (ex: 2004-09-24).  This tag must be used within [[The Loop]].

== Usage ==

%%% <?php the_date_xml(); ?> %%%

== Parameters ==

This tag does not accept any parameters.

== Example ==

 &lt;p&gt;Date posted: <?php the_date_xml(); ?>&lt;/p&gt;

<div style="border:1px solid blue; width:50%; padding:10px">Date posted: 2005-05-14</div>
